LanguageData.AB_TileRoseQuartz.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay. These were built using exotic materials.
LanguageData.AB_TileRoseQuartz.label: rose quartz tile
LanguageData.AB_TileMudstone.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay. These were built using exotic materials.

LanguageData.AB_TileObsidian.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay. These were built using exotic materials.
LanguageData.AB_TileObsidian.label: obsidian tile
LanguageData.AB_FlagstoneRoseQuartz.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources. These were built using exotic materials.
LanguageData.AB_FlagstoneRoseQuartz.label: rose quartz flagstone

LanguageData.AB_AsphaltBridge.label: asphalt bridge
LanguageData.AB_AsphaltBridge.description: A flat wooden surface on supportive beams which can be built over water. You can build light structures on bridges, but be careful - bridges are fragile. If a bridge falls, buildings on top of it fall as well.
